name: Bones and Magic
description:
Bones and Magic is a classic tower defense game. Build traps and towers to make enemy life more difficult.
Choose between fire and lightning magic and use the skills to eliminate all skeletons.

Burn, dismember, electrify and freeze anything that comes your way. Look out for the airship! It offers you upgrade options.


  • Various maps.
  • Different towers and traps.
  • Tower and trap combinations.
  • Different player characters.
  • Various upgrade options.
  • Classic tower defense.
  • Mage Skills.




Do you have any ideas or suggestions for improvement? You can point this out to me directly on the Bones and Magic Discord server.
